# 4.43
pilot: 50*0.25=12.5
null:  50*0.10=5
data:  50*0.65=32.5
10,10,30: 50!/(10!*10!*30!)*0.25^10*0.1^10*0.65^30=0.002026
12.5-2*sqrt(50*0.25*0.75)=6.376276
12.5+2*sqrt(50*0.25*0.75)=18.623724

# 4.45
20!/(7!*5!*2!*0!*1!*5!)*0.3^7*0.1^5*0.07^2*0.07^0*0.08^1*0.38^5=0.000114
.7^20+20*.3*.7^19+20!/(2!*18!)*.3^2*.7^18=0.035483

# 4.47
0.65^8=0.031864
8!/(4!*3!*1!)*0.65^4*0.15^3*0.2^1=0.033738
8*.65=5.2

# 4.49
4*n*p_1+n*p_2
